snippet: David Perron took advantage of one of St. Louis' rare opportunities on Tuesday night, and got the Blues a big win....
lead_paragraph: David Perron took advantage of one of St. Louis' rare opportunities on Tuesday night, and got the Blues a big win.

headline.main: Perron Scores in Overtime, Blues Beat Stars 3-2
headline.print_headline: Perron Scores in Overtime, Blues Beat Stars 3-2
